content:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0184
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: When LBORRES is a continuous measurement, LBSTNRC should be null
Sensitivity: Record
Rule Type: Record Data
Check:
  all:
    - name: LBORRES
      operator: matches_regex
      value: ^[1-9]\d*(\.\d+)?$
    - name: LBSTNRC
      operator: non_empty
Outcome:
  Message: LBSTNRC is populated when LBORRES is a continuous measurement
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
    - RFXENDTC
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0184
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 6.3.5.6
                Item: Specification
                Cited Guidance: >-
                  For normal range values that are character in ordinal scale or if
                  categorical ranges were supplied (e.g., "-1 to +1", "NEGATIVE TO
                  TRACE").
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - LB

json.Description: When LBORRES is a continuous measurement, LBSTNRC should be null

Outcome.Message: LBSTNRC is populated when LBORRES is a continuous measurement

Citations.Cited_Guidance: For normal range values that are character in ordinal scale or if categorical ranges were supplied (e.g., "-1 to +1", "NEGATIVE TO TRACE").
